description: India needs to enhance its weather monitoring to maximize clean energy potential, according to industry leaders. Low weather station density and infrequent measurements hinder wind farm performance. Better weather modeling is crucial for optimizing renewable energy production and ensuring safety and profitability, especially as India aims to expand its renewable capacity significantly by the decade's end.
